# Meditation Session — 2026-02-28

## Session Focus
Documentation quality assurance and DRY principle application

## Insights Consolidated

### DRY Documentation Pattern
Cross-referencing related documents reduces duplication and improves discoverability:
- Add `**Related**: [Doc](./path.md)` links below title/description
- Use relative paths for internal links
- Connect bidirectionally when two docs frequently co-reference

**Files Updated**: 20 documents received Related links
- Architecture: COGNITIVE-ARCHITECTURE, CONSCIOUS-MIND, UNCONSCIOUS-MIND, MEMORY-SYSTEMS, NEUROANATOMICAL-MAPPING, COPILOT-BRAIN, ALEX-IDENTITY, AGENT-CATALOG, TRIFECTA-CATALOG, PROMPT-PIPELINE-ANATOMY, VSCODE-BRAIN-INTEGRATION, SKILLS-CATALOG
- Guides: QUICK-REFERENCE, USER-MANUAL, USE-CASES, VSCODE-CHAT-SETTINGS-GUIDE
